description:
This course is designed to support students in their use of English language in multicultural contexts and to increase their social awareness through reading news articles and discussing current issues. Students are expected to acquire communication strategies for reading, listening, speaking, and writing, develop fluency and autonomy, and improve their critical thinking skills through intensive reading and activities based on the covered topics.
本課程旨在建立以英文為語言媒介，奠定學生學習以英文獲取訊息和知識，並透過不同議題討論和閱讀以增進學生反思與獨立思考的能力。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**COURSE DESCRIPTION**

This course is designed to support students in their use of English language in multicultural contexts and to increase their social awareness through reading news articles and discussing current issues. Students are expected to acquire communication strategies for reading, listening, speaking, and writing, develop fluency and autonomy, and improve their critical thinking skills through intensive reading and activities based on the covered topics.

**REQUIREMENTS & RULES**

1.  When you write to the instructor or the TA, please ALWAYS put “00UB7A6” in the subject line and identify yourself in the email. Anonymous messages WON’T be read.
2.  You will be asked to work in pairs and in groups. Please be a responsible partner.
3.  Attendance is important. Please show up on time. A notification of absence form has to be submitted online (學生請假系統). It is also the students’ own responsibility to catch up with the class after their absence.
4.  Please make sure that you have your Moodle account and check both the course site and your email regularly. Not receiving a notice/an email is NOT an excuse for absence or late submission.
